d16afa0ae7c.description: Mining the tech world for lively, meaningful tales. Part of WIRED Media Group.
d16afa0ae7c.name: Backchannel
d16afa0ae7c.shortDescription: Mining the tech world for lively, meaningful tales.

paragraphs.text: Two years ago, Kik started inviting other companies to test their bot presences on its network through what it then called “promoted chats.” In April, Kik launched its new Bot Shop — an in-app storefront where users can connect with new bot services (like a personal shopper from H&M) and games (like Arterra, a post-apocalyptic space adventure). A week later, Facebook announced its own new bot platform and bot store at its annual F8 developers’ conference. Kik execs insist they didn’t plan a David-bops-Goliath moment. But they smile as they say it.
paragraphs.name: fb51

paragraphs.text: For Kik, the important word in “conversational interface” isn’t “conversation,” it’s “interface.”
Mel’s is delicious, yummy.
paragraphs.name: 4c2a

paragraphs.text: Awesome read. A sad story for digital platform bullies. I had prefer a botspace (taking over apps and URL) than chatterbot apps. That’s more ambitious
paragraphs.name: fb14

ced0058889bb.title: When I interviewed Ivar Chan, Kik’s developer evangelist, he shared with me a framework for…

paragraphs.text: When I interviewed Ivar Chan, Kik’s developer evangelist, he shared with me a framework for building a bot. There are 3 simple rules of thumb and each bot lives within one of four quadrants where the y-axis is “repeat use” and the x-axis is “engagement time”. What still needs to be figured out is the high repeat use, high engagement bot. That’s a…
paragraphs.name: 8cc3

5139fb3453b9.title: Messenger apps are the new distribution platform, and with that thinking, bots are new vehicles for…

paragraphs.text: Messenger apps are the new distribution platform, and with that thinking, bots are new vehicles for a product. We have “mobile first” companies, and soon, we’ll have “bot-first” companies. Case in point? Statsbot. Bots are a new expression of a product’s value. https://medium.com/mixpanel-s-the-signal/your-next-coworker-will-be-a-bot-and-thats-okay-e15c604244a6#.rqilpzpyi

35812403a2f1.title: After reading this I realize how much of the larger community is moving to micro-transactions.

paragraphs.text: After reading this I realize how much of the larger community is moving to micro-transactions. Even across the globe, smaller transactions are empowering people to transcend boundaries. This seems so organic, it could be confused as natural.
